website_summaries.verdict: A budget alternative to a freestanding model. Solid zinc galvanized chain will support bags up to 150 pounds.
pros: A solid steel, powder-coated bracket with zinc galvanized chains
Strong, secure, and suitable for outdoor use
Can hold a bag up to 150 pounds
No-twist swivel action reduces strain on bracket and mounting placement
cons: Needs to be hung from a wooden beam

customer_reviews.title: Great with one exception.
customer_reviews.text: I've now put these chains through the ringer. I've hit the bag everyday for weeks and I've encountered no problems. Feels sturdy and the swivel works perfectly. Never had any chains get bound together or crossed or any other problems. The only issue I ran into is the screws included to connect it to wood beam are very cheap. The first one snapped in half when I was drilling it in. I ran down the streeet to the hardware store and bought 2 quality all steel screws for $0.84 total. No problems since. Plan on buying two steel wood screws, but besides that everything else is fabulous and the price cannot remotely be beat. Overall, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jabroni

customer_reviews.title: ... be able to hold the bag in place just fine, as long as your bag is just for ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it would be able to hold the bag in place just fine, as long as your bag is just for display. I set it up, my wife and I went through four rounds each, and in the end half the carabiners were stretched out and useless. We were using a 60 pound bag, I'm 180 pounds and haven't done any bag work in almost a decade, basically we weren't being SUPER tough on it. Bummer, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous. Stay away
customer_reviews.text: This product came partially assembled including the bolt that connects the upper and lower half. While my 8 year old son was hitting a 70 pound heavy bag, the bolt came undone causing the bag and lower assembly crashing to the ground. Luckily no one was hurt but if this device can’t handle an 8 year old punching a 70 pound bag then it shouldn’t be sold on any site much less amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Keeps falling down
customer_reviews.text: Put a 80 pound punching bag on it and it rotates itself unscrewing the bolt. Needs a lock washer or something. Punch 20 times and have to reinstall it. It seemed hefty enough until we used it. It needs a bit of redesign to prevent the nut from unscrewing so quickly from the bolt and dropping the bag on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L

customer_reviews.title: The chain and swivel are NOT heavy duty enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: The chain and swivel are NOT heavy duty enough for a 100 lb. heavy bag. The "spring links" that are above and below the swivel are large enough to put at the end of decent-sized chains, but the rest of it is not suitable. The links in the chains themselves are only 1" - 1 1/4" long and very "thin". The "spring links" that attach the bag to the chains are of similar size - unsuitably thin. The D-rings of the swivel are VERY small and the pin that holds them together appears only large enough to secure two ends of a Heavy Duty key chain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the Bolts that Come with it to Install it.
customer_reviews.text: The product might be great, but the bolts sent with it to install it were inferior quality. One of them sheared and the head broke off with the final HAND tightening. We couldn't back it out, even with the special drill bit that does that. As a result, we had to take out the hardware and start all over again. That's why I gave it 3 stars on ease of installation. I'm hoping that the rest of the hanger turns out to be more durable, but I must admit, I'm a little worried as I hear my daughter punching her lovely pink 70 lb. punching bag.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Works with multiple bags, comes with 4 carabiners
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerned when I bought this because I realized my punching bag utilizes a different style of straps to hang it, but I was able to remove the chains from this setup and simple hang my bag from the swivel ceiling mount. Does exactly what I needed, now I don't have to manually hang my bag on my weight cage every time I want to switch between boxing and weight-lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: A solid product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 88lb heavy bag that didn't come with a chain and had to get one separately. Settled on this product, mainly because it was right size, had swivel and made of rain-proof material. I've been using it for a week and so far no complaints. The reason why I didn't give 5 stars is because the product isn't as thick as I expected. Maybe it's not an issue, maybe it is... I suppose I'll find out in a year or 2. So far no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it less than a would star I would. As soon as I got it set in to the beam most fit in my house, And finally thought awesome I'll get to put my bag to use. The screws snapped off at the first thread and the mount came crashing into the top of my head.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail S. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 100 lb boxing bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this chain for a boxing stand I owned that was missing the chain and it was super easy setting it up. I wasn't concerned that it would fall over or that the chain couldn't hold the weight. This was inexpensive and saved the day so I can keep boxing away :)
customer_reviews.author: T family

customer_reviews.title: Junk hardware
customer_reviews.text: Bolt snapped on install. It can’t hold a 80 lb bag if it can’t handle being installed into a rafter I should have listened to reviews
customer_reviews.author: C Yuenger

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Item does not come with chains as it is in the picture only reason I purchased this was to get the item with the chains otherwise would have bought a better model
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and it’s already falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve expected this when I purchased but even for the price it’s really cheap material. This shouldn’t be advertised as a heavy bag chain. Since I first started using it I had trouble getting the hanging clips to stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: ... it are not as high quality as I would like, and the other gear could use to be ...
customer_reviews.text: My reservation about giving it a 5* review is that the lag bolts that come with it are not as high quality as I would like, and the other gear could use to be bigger. The swivel / carabiner / chain are relatively small and made me nervous with a 100lb bag. I replaced them with bigger parts from the hardware store but used the mounting bracket as purchased. I think this would work great for a 40-60 lb bag, though.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Early to give a complete assessment, but so far, 1 week of light use, its held up just fine. Theres adequate chain length, with the clips you can adjust the height. I had to shorten the length some, which was simple. Its holding a 150lb bag. Will update if there are any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joe_OH.IO

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you install it in a stud on the ceiling! Currently holding a 100 pound bag with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Taylor S

customer_reviews.title: Husband was pleased with gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He is very pleased with this chain and swivel set. His bag isn't heavy, but I told him that it would hold a heavier bag and that it received good reviews by other users with heavy bags in case he wanted to upgrade. Our basement is not finished and he used one board across several floor joists to bolt it too. But it would have fit fine on one floor joist if that was how he chose to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Missing Piece
customer_reviews.text: I received my product on time laster year but I was missing a clip. I used one from my house but unfortunately 4 months later that clip is breaking from the weight. It would be nice if I could have a replacement clip for the one I never received.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Like the functionality of it. Not having to be tied to the big stand is great.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good mount. Included bolts are flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good mount for my punching bag, but one of the included bolts sheared off when I was installing it in my basement. Now I have to go to the hardware store and get a replacement. Not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Hector E.

customer_reviews.title: Nut keeps coming loose with use
customer_reviews.text: Hung a 70lb bag to a beam. Worked as expected but center bolt and nut assembly came apart after about 6 months of light use. Reattached with a lock nut which lasted a little longer but even that came apart. Next round I plan on drilling a bolt and using a cotter pin and castle nut. That should do it. Price is right but if you're not handy you may want to keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Keegan

customer_reviews.title: do not use provided screws
customer_reviews.text: so far so good not the best quality looks cheap and like it will break after a while........ update.... 6.3.2020 great product so far so good been beating my bag and still hasn't broke.
customer_reviews.author: GLOCK MONSTER

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used them long.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten much use out of them, but the chains seem a bit thin, I think I might have been better off buying the needed hardware at Home Depot or something and putting one together myself, time will tell though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H Myers

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made Chain, Did Not Feel Stable
customer_reviews.text: This chain was of a cheap quality just seem put together. The clasps on this just did not seem reassuring to hang a punching bag on plus all the reviews I ended up finding that the chain was failing in use and out of use.
customer_reviews.author: Aquarian Trilogy

customer_reviews.title: Rip off.
customer_reviews.text: Ad is totally misleading. This is not heavy duty. The box it came in is about 3 inches long 2 inches wide totally disappointed. I feel duped. Unless your hanging a 10 pound bag don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: byron rainer

customer_reviews.title: A little short but great
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of using this it’s definitely what I was looking for. It’s a bit shorter then I wanted, but luckily it has clips to wear you can easily add in some chain and have it secure.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: My original straps dry rotted and this was a great replacement. Stands up to the weight and punishment amazingly well
customer_reviews.author: Mario Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Danger....Not a safe product.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved and mounted 11/4. Ive thrown several hundre punches through the last few days and on 11/9 the bag fell on a weak left double jab. My 4 year old throws punches on this bag. .....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combination
customer_reviews.text: Perfect combination for a heavy bag I have with no hardware. The chain is not real thick like my other heavy bag but that has not been a problem. Constructed well, all the lengths of chain are even, connects to the rings on the bag securely and it's a perfect match for the swivel. I had a spring already or I would have picked up one. You should use a spring as a shock absorber. Now I have the two heavy bags mounted up and ready to go. A good price too for the combination.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Haven't fell yet
customer_reviews.text: Had to make adjustments. This isn't for all bags. I will make review updates as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hardware
customer_reviews.text: Was installing it and the head of the bolt sheard off waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Morbidtish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 80# bag
customer_reviews.text: I added a dampening spring and about 17” of chain to drop it down to the right level in my garage. This attachment is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bittersweet

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The screws are cheap and got chewed off quickly. The middle bar is bent. This thing is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Marco L

customer_reviews.title: Nice little mount.
customer_reviews.text: This mount seems pretty durable was pretty easy to install. It's not super heavy duty and might not stand up to long term abuse, but it's held up pretty well so far. Definitely worth what it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Nachtrab

customer_reviews.title: SOLID!
customer_reviews.text: This chain is well made and is the perfect length for my needs. I'm tall, my old chain was to long, now I can get in some uppercuts! The swivel design is also less stressful on the wood beams in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: pandaPCtech

customer_reviews.title: Punching bag holds great
customer_reviews.text: Used this to hold a pretty heavy punching bag and so far even with the beaten the bag takes, it all stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially for the price. The only downfall is that the locking pin cannot be removed or replaced with the bag hanging from it.
customer_reviews.author: Thrisha Nesbitt

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, have punching bag held securely.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, have punching bag held securely. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: ip

customer_reviews.title: Would order this again
customer_reviews.text: This mount is easy to install and very sturdy. It does exactly what it should for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Walker

customer_reviews.title: Just what needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for ou 100lb bag. I attached it to a 2x4 and installed it across a couple of beams under drywall. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: Holds 100lb  bag
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy, holds 100lb bag easily. No issues while punching. Did use additional bolts from hardware store just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used in garage. It is attached to a ceiling joist, so it’s extra durable for the heavy bag
customer_reviews.author: AdamsB915

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say really. Bolt it to a ceiling joist and hook up your bag. Built in swivel is great
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Should have included some flat washers... the nylock nut works loose too easily... Otherwise it is ok. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just hungMy heavy bag!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install, they give you 2 lag bolts to screw right into a joist, then you are pretty much ready to work out. Seems sturdy so far, very glad I bought this, Stores were selling the chain and mount separately for $20-30 each.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice chain but there is no way you can hang ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice chain but there is no way you can hang it in your garage from the rafters or the ceiling. It does not provide extra support for your home structure. The average 2x8 would break from the jerking and I am only 140lbs
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Yo Adrian...
customer_reviews.text: Good design concepts...too light on the robustness of the chain gauge. I simply used the top connector on my old chain as I was afraid the system would break under my 100 pound bag. All 5 clips are locking type...too bad the part is light-weight. For a quick fix (my bag chain top link broke)...it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: After months of punching the heavyweight bag, no issues! A bit noisy on the swing of the bag, as expected.
customer_reviews.author: angirn

customer_reviews.title: Great for 150lbs heavy bag
customer_reviews.text: I have a Thi heavy bag (150 lbs) and this is awesome because it comes with TWO large bolts to hold it into the roof. Its great! I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Seemed weak. But installed a 80lbs bag and has held up with no issues
customer_reviews.author: QUATERMILE

customer_reviews.title: Small but productive even tho late
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a three star because of the delivery time, I think it got lost, because it was so small took over a month to get. They had me to reorder the idem. But I got it and it’s perfect for my punching bag.....
customer_reviews.author: The truth

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and took my husband about 5 mins to install.
customer_reviews.author: Genese

customer_reviews.title: It works nice for what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a problem with it and it works nice with my punching bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not the sturdiest
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest and would not recommend for heavy bags.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Chain is thin
customer_reviews.text: Was far more flimsy than I wanted but I didn't return because it wasn't an awful chain, just not enough for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Holding up a 100lb bag for weeks without flinching so far. Very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Reaper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great with our stand,and is very durable. It holds our 80lb heavy bag.
customer_reviews.author: Patience

customer_reviews.title: Mounting screw broke
customer_reviews.text: Went to install onto load bearing beam in basement...head of screw snapped off an inch short of snug.Aluminum pot metal mix perhaps? Unit itself looks fine and of good quality...I see no reason it shouldn't work well...once I get back from hardware store to buy real American made screws to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Only issue is it’s missing 2 clips.
customer_reviews.text: The chain will definitely get the job done, but when I got it in today, it only had 2 clips (supposed to have 4) to clip onto the 4 bag loops. I don’t really like putting out low stars, but it’s kind of a nuisance having to go out and search for the right sized clip that’s weight bearing capable.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Usable
customer_reviews.text: The mount and bolts that go directly into the support beam is solid; but the second piece that connects to the mount with two different bolts constantly came lose and stripped the threading. I was able to secure it permanently with a few new bolts, washers, and some loctite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how to orient the thing because it did not come with instructions.However I managed to hang my 70 lb bag and it turns and rotates.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: This is junk, screws lost thread out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Screw heads broke as soon as bag was attached but after getting new screws has been working great
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. easy to use all ready to be hung up!! very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicente Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: It's great quality
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't easy to install in the ceiling but it was stable and it did the trick !
customer_reviews.author: Luke Duke

customer_reviews.title: Happy ..... does get noisy with time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install..... would give it 5 stars but with time it starts to get noisy ..... maybe it just needs lubrication .... overall happy with the product and price
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: WIMPY
customer_reviews.text: This couldn't hold a stuffed animal.....its tiny compared to the ringside mount/chain sold here.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Have had my 80 pound punching bag up for months now and it's still holding up. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a thicker metal online but holds a 40lb bag well.
customer_reviews.author: Mat Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Holds my 100lb bag through heavy use, and my kid's every attempt to rip it out of the ceiling has been met with their swinging safely through the air. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Item is very easy to install and it works perfect inside my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: well made, great option to hang your punching bag
customer_reviews.text: steel parts will hold up, your real worry is what you will attach them to! find a good beam for your heavy bag and you should be all set, this will definitely do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in GA

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 80 lb bag perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 80 lb bag! I hung it outside on a wooden swing set that already had swing mounts, so I didn't buy the mounting bracket. However, I recently moved and plan to hang it below my deck so I'll be buying the mount soon.
customer_reviews.author: Genave

customer_reviews.title: Has been up for 2 weeks now and works fine. My bag is 80lbs and it works great
customer_reviews.text: Has been up for 2 weeks now and works fine. My bag is 80lbs and it works great. I did replace the two screws after reading some reviews about them so I got 3inxh screws directly into the studs and it's good to go
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Missing chains
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on time but it never came with the chains. It just came with the mounting device even though it was advertising chains are included.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe R

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. Sturdy and durable for his punching bag.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to install and is very sturdy. I have a rather large heavy bag and it is mounted quite securely in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: It does it job.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend put it up so I’m guessing it was easy also my punching bag haven’t fall on me so that’s cool.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Felix

customer_reviews.title: Top Screw eventually breaks
customer_reviews.text: After about 2 weeks of use, the top screw unwinds itself (this stems from the bags ability to rotate) Due to the weight of the heavy bag, the screw gets damaged and your heavy bag falls on you. I now have a damaged screw and bolt and no way to rehang the bag.
customer_reviews.author: The Critical Patron

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong for 100 pounds heavy bag
customer_reviews.text: Not a very strong and durable product. I am using this for a 100 pound heavy bag. Had to replace the bolts already.
customer_reviews.author: Dschmuza

customer_reviews.title: Pics are different from the real
customer_reviews.text: I have a heavy bag and it’s HEAVY! the pics are different that the real deal they look good on the pics. But look very weak when I got them. They didn’t break (Yet). 🤞🏻
customer_reviews.author: Weston

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Hung a 50lb boxing bag in our workout room in our house with this thing. Swivels great so as not to stress out our ceiling. Very inexpensive compared to others and does the job great!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great- you can swivel or not
customer_reviews.text: If you want it to swivel there is a stop bolt to remove. If not you leave in.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Screws broke
customer_reviews.text: Am a bit concerned about it’s ability to hold up my heavy bag, haven’t even got to try it get as - like many reviewers I wish I’d read first - the head popped of the screw as I was attaching it to wooden beam. Why don’t you just supply better screws? They are not expensive. Glad it broke while installing it though, and not while my kids were punching it...
customer_reviews.author: Furyswipe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Got my own 80lbs heavy bag hooked on it. Found the best support beam to place it in my garage. Hasn’t caused any issues
customer_reviews.author: Thrift shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bad hardware great chains.
customer_reviews.text: The lags were crap. Even with predrilled holes they stripped with the right size bit and little pressure. Had to get different lags. Also the lock nuts are crap for any heavy punching. Chains and anchor are great however just bad hardware.
customer_reviews.author: CoachAdam

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. We heavily use our punching bag and this holds up well. The only thing to be aware of is it will make a lot of noise if this is on a bottom floor/basement
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need to mount a heavy bag!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with any heavy bag. If you get the Everlast 2 Station Heavy Bag Stand or the Everlast 70 Lb Heavy Bag Kit then you don't need this. Otherwise enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Dva

customer_reviews.title: Hold over 300lbs my girlfriends dad was hanging from them ...
customer_reviews.text: Hold over 300lbs my girlfriends dad was hanging from them and then I used the mount and bolt to hold up her hammock in our room, this mount is outstanding in the way it distributes weight and hold the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Only had for like 2 weeks and just noticed this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good .. not as long as I’d like it to be ..
customer_reviews.author: W Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, cheaply made trash
customer_reviews.text: After being mounted and lightly used, one of the SCREWS just broke out of mount!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Neff

customer_reviews.title: I aways wanted a punching bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well just remember your going to have to go to home Depot for that extra length of chain from the mount to this chain as it's not that long but does what it's supposed to ....
customer_reviews.author: MIKEJANINA

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product does what it’s supposed to do nothing fancy dancy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe E Bananas

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived after estimated delivery date, but not terribly late. Was packed well and as described by the seller. Overall, happy with the purchase. It holds the 70lb bag we own well and has stood up to a 220lb man hitting it for 2 weeks straight. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A History of Her Story

customer_reviews.title: Chain and swivel have a good solid heft to them and are rock steady in ...
customer_reviews.text: Chain and swivel have a good solid heft to them and are rock steady in holding a 100lb bag from a cross beam in the basement. I ended up shortening the chain by 3-4 links with the carabiner to get it at the correct height.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Item was great easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Item was great easy to install. Only thing I would suggest is to get better hardware from Home Depot, the bolts it comes with are pretty standard and can break, so other than that the hanger works great.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Has held pretty well for the past 6 months. Can’t conplain.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Sturdy and can hold up to the beating I deliver to my bag. I use it on an Everest stand that I purchased long ago but lost the original chain. Great replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainHulkX

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: A good product for the price. Not the heaviest duty chain link but strong enough to hold and 80 lb. bag. Seems like it will last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

product_meta.title: Yes4All Combo Wall Mount Punching Bag Hanger and Heavy Bag Swivel Chain
feature_bullets: SOLID STEEL WOODBEAM HANGER CONSTRUCTION: Solid U-steel plates covered with enamel power coating for more durability and corrosion resistance
DURABLE BOLT AND SWIVEL CAPABILITY: for superior strength and smooth swivel, can be used as a mount point for single or double heavy bags up to 150 lbs
CORROSION RESISTANT STURDY CHAINS: made from high quality galvanized zinc preventing rust and corrosion, thick chain design ensures durability even when used with heavy weights
360 DEGREE SWIVEL DESIGN: Forget about your chains all twisted up while and after training. Our swivel chains keep your training a breeze and can turn side to side without ever getting tangled up
INDOOR & OUTDOOR USE: Quick and easy installation with the included bolts so you can jump right into your most intense MMA, Muay Thai, cardio and strength building training sessions
